job.title: Data Scientist

products are simple effective and backed by science Our mission is simple to empower people to feel their best by turning healthy habits into a ritualltpgtltpgtWe have built a team of curious skeptics worldclass scientists unconventional artists expert marketers and analytical strategists that are on a mission to reinvent an entire industry Were wellfunded growing quickly and committed to our mission If youre a team player who refuses to settle for the status quo we want you ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtEssentialltstronggtltpgtltpgtThe ltstronggtData Scientistltstronggt will be Science and key stakeholders from product and customer growth on evaluating retention performance designing and analyzing AB test results working with analytics engineers to create new data models and exploring new data sources to add to our Analytic Data WarehouseltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtWhat Youll DoltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtLeverage event operational and survey data to understand products to help drive engagement and customer valueltligtltligtPartner with various stakeholders from consumer insights customer growth product and marketing teams on measurement strategy and data
